title: Game-Changer: ₱140M Farm-to-Market Road breaks ground in Lamut, Ifugao
desc: Lamut, Ifugao – Local farmers in Lamut, Ifugao will soon have improved access to markets following the recent groundbreaking of a farm-to-market road (FMR) project in the town.For many years, farmers from the upland sitios of Bannit and Nabanngan in Barangay Payawan, and Sitio Nunhabatan in Barangay Hapid, have struggled to transport their produce to markets due to poor road conditions.Long travel times, high transportation costs, and impassable roads during the rainy season have often resulted
